abstract: IPhone users are not like the rest of cellphone users. A study says 37 percent of iPhone users watch video (ten times more than the average cellphone user), 20 percent play online games (nine time more than average) and 33 percent send instant messages (three times more than average).
snippet: IPhone users are not like the rest of cellphone users. A study says 37 percent of iPhone users watch video (ten times more than the average cellphone user), 20 percent play online games (nine time more than average) and 33 percent send instant mes...
lead_paragraph: On Monday, analysts and Apple watchers alike hope to see what Steven Jobs, the chief executive of Apple, has planned for the next generation of the iPhone. Until then, and to whet your appetite, Nielsen Mobile shared some first-quarter 2008 data about how iPhone owners use their phones to communicate with each other.
